metadata.title: CVE-2018-14446 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: MP4Integer32Property::Read in atom_avcC.cpp in MP4v2 2.1.0 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedMP4 file.

criterions.comment: mp4v2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
